summary: This document appears to be a record of text messages from August 2019 discussing Jeffrey Epstein's death, media attention, and a civil case. The messages express opinions about Epstein and reference communication with an unnamed individual regarding a legal decision.

events.title: Discussion of Epstein's death
events.description: Text message conversation speculating about Jeffrey Epstein's death, calling him a coward and a 'very bad man', and suggesting someone may have had him killed.

events.title: Civil case decision awaited
events.description: Text message indicates the sender spoke with someone who will inform them of the decision in a civil case, likely related to Epstein.

keyFacts: Text messages from August 2019 discuss Jeffrey Epstein's death and public reaction.
One message speculates Epstein may have been killed, calling him 'a very bad man' and 'a coward'.
A civil case related to the Epstein matter is referenced, with a decision pending.
The document shows ongoing private discussions about the case following Epstein's death in August 2019.
